Package me.kiip.api

Interface Summary
Kiip.ContentListener Interface for receiving a callback when a user has won in-game content
Kiip.RequestListener<T> Interface for receiving callbacks for HTTP requests
Kiip.SwarmListener Interface for receiving a callback when a user has selected to participate in a Kiip Swarm
Kiip.ViewListener Interface for receiving notifications of Kiip views showing/dismissing.
 

Class Summary
Achievement  
Kiip Shared entry point to initializing Kiip, communicating with Kiip servers and accessing it's shared state.
Leaderboard  
Resource Class which stores Kiip resource attributes.
 

Enum Summary
Kiip.Position Enumeration for positions Resource's can be displayed.
 

Exception Summary
KiipException
